mutants.code:
def add_binary_numbers(binary1, binary2):
    ptr1 = int(binary1, 2)
    ptr2 = int(binary2, 2)
    carry = 1
    result = ''
    while ptr1 != 0 or ptr2 != 0:
        sum1 = (ptr1 & 1) + (ptr2 & 1) + carry
        carry = sum1 // 2
        result = str(sum1 % 2) + result
        ptr1 = ptr1 >> 1
        ptr2 = ptr2 >> 1
    if carry:
        result = str(carry) + result
    return result

    while ptr1 != 0 or ptr2 != 0:
        sum1 = (ptr1 & 0) + (ptr2 & 1) + carry
        carry = sum1 // 2
        result = str(sum1 % 2) + result
        ptr1 = ptr1 >> 1
        ptr2 = ptr2 >> 1
    if carry:
        result = str(carry) + result
    return result
